welcome.title: Managing Tasks
welcome.text: Keep track of daily tasks and recurring activities. Assign tasks to carers and monitor completion status from a single dashboard.

addTask.title: Adding a New Task
addTask.text: Click 'Add Task', enter a title and optional details, set a due date if needed, then save. Tasks appear in the Active tab.

recurring.title: Recurring Tasks
recurring.text: Toggle 'Make recurring' to auto-create tasks daily, weekly, or monthly. When completed, the next occurrence is created automatically.

complete.title: Completing Tasks
complete.text: Click 'Mark Done' to complete a task. It moves to the Done tab and is auto-deleted after 7 days.

assign.title: Assigning Tasks
assign.text: Use the 'Assign To' dropdown to delegate tasks to specific care team members.

walkthrough.step1: Click 'Add Task' to create a new task.
walkthrough.step2: Enter a clear, descriptive title for your task.
walkthrough.step3: Optionally set a due date for the task.
walkthrough.step4: Toggle this to make the task repeat automatically.
walkthrough.step5: Click to save your new task.
walkthrough.step6: View completed tasks in the Done tab.

tooltip.assign: Assign task to a team member

welcome.title: Care Notes
welcome.text: Document daily care activities, observations, and handover notes. Track wellbeing with mood, eating, and bathroom indicators.

addNote.title: Adding a Care Note
addNote.text: Click 'Add Daily Note', describe the activity/support provided, add observations and next steps for handover.

quickTags.title: Quick Tags
quickTags.text: Use colourful tags like Personal Care, Meal Prep, Medication, and Outing to categorise activities quickly.

wellbeing.title: Wellbeing Trackers
wellbeing.text: Record mood, eating/drinking status, and bathroom usage for comprehensive care documentation.

bodyMap.title: Body Map
bodyMap.text: Use the interactive body map to log and track physical observations, marks, or injuries with precise location recording.

archive.title: Notes Archive
archive.text: Access historical notes by date. Review past care documentation and track patterns over time.

walkthrough.step1: Click to add a new daily care note.
walkthrough.step2: Describe the activity or support you provided.
walkthrough.step3: Select quick tags to categorise the note.
walkthrough.step4: Record the person's mood during your visit.
walkthrough.step5: Use Body Map to log physical observations.
walkthrough.step6: Access past notes in the Archive tab.

tooltip.bodyMapTab: Log physical observations on body map
tooltip.incident: Flag this note as an incident report

welcome.title: Scheduling & Time
welcome.text: Manage carer shifts, track attendance, and handle schedule changes. View by week, month, or list format.

viewModes.title: View Modes
viewModes.text: Switch between Week, Month, and List views to see the schedule in your preferred format.

addShift.title: Adding Shifts
addShift.text: Click 'Add Shift', select a carer, set date and times, then save. Assign recurring shifts for regular schedules.

clockInOut.title: Clock In/Out
clockInOut.text: Carers use Clock In when starting and Clock Out when finishing. Times are recorded for payroll.

requests.title: Change Requests
requests.text: Review and approve or deny shift change requests from carers in the Requests tab.

export.title: Export Timesheets
export.text: Export time entries to CSV for payroll processing. Select date range and download.

walkthrough.step1: View the schedule calendar with all shifts.
walkthrough.step2: Switch between week, month, and list views.
walkthrough.step3: Click to add a new shift to the schedule.
walkthrough.step4: Clock in when starting your shift.

tooltip.scheduleTab: View and manage the full schedule
tooltip.clockIn: Start your shift and record time

welcome.title: Diet Tracking
welcome.text: Log meals and drinks throughout the day. Track portion sizes and add photos for visual records.

mealTypes.title: Meal Categories
mealTypes.text: Entries are organised by meal type: Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Snacks, and Drinks.

addEntry.title: Adding an Entry
addEntry.text: Select a meal tab, click 'Add Entry', describe what was eaten, and note how much was left.

photos.title: Photo Documentation
photos.text: Optionally add a photo of the meal for visual reference and better documentation.

archive.title: Diet Archive
archive.text: Review past diet entries to track eating patterns and nutrition over time.

walkthrough.step1: Select the meal type (Breakfast, Lunch, etc.).
walkthrough.step2: Click to add a new diet entry.
walkthrough.step3: Describe what was eaten or drunk.
walkthrough.step4: Select how much was left uneaten.
walkthrough.step5: Optionally add a photo of the meal.

tooltip.photo: Add a photo of the meal

welcome.title: Medication Administration
welcome.text: Track medications with scheduled doses. Record when medications are given, missed, or refused.

addMed.title: Adding Medications
addMed.text: Add medications with name, dosage, frequency, and scheduled times. Doses are auto-generated.

frequency.title: Frequency Settings
frequency.text: Choose from 1x, 2x, 3x, or 4x daily. Time slots are preset but can be customised.

markDose.title: Recording Doses
markDose.text: Mark each dose as Given, Missed, or Refused. Add notes for any special circumstances.

history.title: MAR History
history.text: View complete medication administration history with timestamps and who administered each dose.

walkthrough.step1: Click to add a new medication.
walkthrough.step4: Select how often it's taken daily.
walkthrough.step5: Review or adjust the scheduled times.
walkthrough.step6: Mark the dose as given, missed, or refused.

tooltip.markTaken: Record that the dose was given

welcome.title: Appointments
welcome.text: Manage upcoming medical appointments, therapy sessions, and other scheduled events.

addAppt.title: Adding Appointments
addAppt.text: Enter the appointment title, description, date, time, and location.

dateTime.title: Date & Time
dateTime.text: Use the calendar to select the date and time picker for the appointment time.

location.title: Location
location.text: Add the appointment location for easy reference on the day.

status.title: Status Tracking
status.text: Appointments show as Today (amber), Upcoming (green), or Past (grey).

walkthrough.step1: Click to add a new appointment.

welcome.title: Time & Payroll
welcome.text: Track care hours and export timesheets for payroll processing.

weeklyHours.title: Weekly Summary
weeklyHours.text: See total hours logged this week at a glance.

calendarView.title: Time Calendar
calendarView.text: View time entries on a calendar. See which shifts have been completed.

export.title: Export Payroll
export.text: Export time entries to CSV format for payroll processing and record keeping.

walkthrough.step2: See time entries on the calendar.
walkthrough.step3: Click an entry to see details.

tooltip.weeklyHours: Total care hours logged this week
